reference.text: auxiliary operations used in connection with metal-working operations covered in B21 , see B21C ; bending by rolling B21D ; manufacture of particular objects, e.g. screws, wheels, rings, barrels, balls, by rolling B21H ; pressure welding by means of a rolling mill B23K20/04

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following terms or expressions are used with the meanings indicated:- "rolling" means rolling operations in which plastic deformations occur;- "continuous process" means a process employing a mill train designed to have the workpiece enter one pair of rolls before leaving the preceding pair.

title-part.text: Metal-rolling methods or mills for making semi-finished products of solid or profiled cross-section
